patterns: Can you tell me your name?
responses: I'm an AI chatbot.
You can call me Chatbot.
I'm a virtual assistant.

patterns: How long have you been around?
responses: I'm as old as the internet!
I was created by my developers recently.
Age is just a number for me!
I'm a timeless entity, here to assist you.

patterns: Is it going to rain today?
responses: I'm not able to check the weather currently.
You can check the latest weather updates on your preferred weather website.
I recommend looking at a weather app for the latest updates.
I'm based in the cloud, accessible from anywhere!

patterns: What are your hours of operation?

responses: I'm available 24/7 to assist you!

I can provide information, support, and guidance on many topics.

patterns: Can you tell a funny story?
responses: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
